transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi sir, good evening. Main Parvez bol raha hun IndiaMART se. Account manager hamari aapki last week baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir jo concern aapne raise kara tha na aapka jo system log out ho ja raha hai bar bar account aur aapke paas haan haan aapke paas deliver nahi ho raha hai SMS but SMS na sir aapko regular basis pe deliver ho raha hai same time pe. Jo hamari team ko guide karne ke liye bola hai ek bar aap apna SMS ka spam ya fir jo aapka storage hai SMS ka wo ek bar please clear kar lijiyega first jo hamari team ne bola hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: And ek bar aap please jo bhi system hai matlab apna jo phone hai wo restart kar lijiyega pehle dusra.
Customer: Phone mein dikkat nahi hai boss meri PC mein dikkat hai.
Executive: Haan main wahi bol raha hun jaise aapne wo bhi mention kara tha ki SMS nahi aata hai. Hai na aapne ye bhi shayad mention kar rakha hai.
Customer: Haan matlab mail nahi aati uske aas paas. Haan haan theek hai. Dusri cheez maine unse requirement jo aapki hai concern mail ki bar bar log out ho ja raha hai uska maine data nikalwaya hai uska kya reason hai. Abhi unhone bola hai ki wo ek bar login kar le dobara se SMS wala issue aapka khatam ho jayega hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan login to meri baat suno Parvez ji roz subah karte hi hai na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Roz login to aap keh rahe ho na roz subah karna hi padta hai hamare ko.
Executive: Haan aap roz subah roz subah system mein login karte hain aap. Agle subah jab aap fir se wapas aate hain to fir se wo log out rehta hai aisa hi hai na?
Customer: Ji ji haan.
Executive: Haan pehle aise nahi hua karta tha aap agar aaj login kar diya aapne abhi maine login kiya hua hai mera.
Executive: Haan main keh raha hun ki agar pehle aise nahi hota tha na ki agar aapne aaj subah login kara to kal aapko fir se login karna pade.
Customer: Bas bas abhi kya ho raha hai jaise abhi light gayi to wapis login nahi karna padega to to apne aap ho jata hai. Lekin jaise aaj system band karke gaye na subah karna hai na.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Tab wo login manta hai mujhe lagta hai particular kuch period ke liye system band hone ke baad wo login manta hai.
Executive: Haan to sir sir sir main na main aapko batata hun reason this is for your privacy this is for your privacy and security safety ke liye hai wo ki kuch limited period ke time se hamare sath bhi na system mein hai agar hum apna account aadhe ghante ya ek ghante ke andar are sir usme to 10 minute lag jate hain sir isme.
Executive: Nahi to sir 10 minute ka to nahi hoga mujhe lagta hai 10 minute mein nahi login mangta hoga.
Customer: OTP bhi nahi aata mere bhai OTP bhi nahi aata hai.
Executive: Haan OTP ka wahi OTP ka jo problem hai na wo aapka spam aur jo blocked calls hai usme aap SMS mein please check kar lijiyega you have to just delete all the messages from your spam hai na aap ek bar clear kar lijiye aur ek bar restart kar lijiye phone ko OTP ke liye bas ye ek process unhone bataya wo theek ho jayega. Baki login jo aap keh rahe hain mangta hai wo bar bar nahi mangega time duration hota hai jab tak aap system pe rahoge aapko login nahi mangega jab aapne lambe period ke liye system login nahi tha ye pehle nahi tha.
Customer: Pehle to nahi tha ye pehle nahi tha.
Executive: Haan bilkul main man sakta hun main ek bar confirm kar leta hun isiliye jahan tak mujhe lagta hai.
Customer: Confirm karo please hai na.
Executive: Haan bas maine wo same cheez pucha hua hai kyuki hamare sath bhi ye cheez aaj se nahi pehle se hi hai ki hum jab bhi aadhe ghante se zyada agar ho jata hai aur hum system pe nahi hote ya fir hamara koi bhi click system pe hamare account par nahi hota hai.
Customer: Are wo to aapki security hai sir wo aapki security hai us sheet pe. Haan kyuki aapki sheet common dega hamare to chamber mein hai sir ye kaun aayega tumhara. Achcha achcha nahi sir bhi sir chaliye koi nahi ek bar main confirm karta hun sir fir hum iske regarding closer pe baat karenge theek hai. Theek theek.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- System logs out repeatedly.

- Not receiving SMS.

- Customer facing issue with PC.



Resolution:

- Asked to clear SMS spam and storage.

- Suggested restarting the phone.

- Explained the reason for frequent logouts.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- log out, sms, system, privacy, security
